title: Portal: visualize ball missing/unknown + event evidence pointers
scope: Improve internal portal visibility into ball missing/unknown states and event evidence pointers to reduce audit time.
Provide consistent rendering for evidence pointers (artifact_id + time_range_ms/frame_range) where they appear in task/audit surfaces.
Keep portal deterministic and safe (no untrusted command execution).
acceptance: Portal renders evidence pointers in a structured way (artifact_id + range) rather than opaque strings when available.
Intent/task pages highlight ball trust-first semantics (missing/unknown) as key audit signals for INT-040.
UI changes are covered by minimal component-level checks or deterministic render snapshots where feasible.

deliverables.title: Portal structured rendering for evidence pointers and ball states
acceptance: Evidence pointers are displayed as (artifact + range) when present in structured form.
Quality blockers related to ball missing/unknown semantics are prominently visible.
evidence: `npm run guardrails` passes; portal refresh surfaces remain functional.

subtasks.title: Add UI component for evidence pointer rendering.
done_when: Evidence pointers are rendered in a consistent, human-readable format across portal views.

subtasks.title: Highlight ball missing/unknown audit signals on intent/task pages.
done_when: INT-040-related pages surface ball trust-first semantics and blockers prominently.
